favourite.article: Any time I sense any failure in my Christian life, listening to the song it reminds me of the Lord's LOVE for me. I do not get revived only but also get on track to my Christian life.
Oh Lord Jesus my soul loves You. I desire nothing that this world has to offer, for it does not match Your greatness.

Mary, seeking her Beloved, in her seeking, had the opportunity to contemplate the glory of the resurrected Christ, even before God the Father did. What a seeker! She touched the Lord, she caused Him to come out.... What a wonderful lesson. That was very early in the morning, the first day of the week, desperate to find Him. Praise the Lord!

This hymn is a clear indication that our Christ is resurrected and today we can enjoy Him as resurrection life in our mingled spirit. Oh Lord Jesus You are the life-giving Spirit. We still love You. Amen.
Oh Lord Jesus! This hymn is so precious and touching. Thank You Lord for Your love and righteousness! Jesus is Lord saints!
Where is He my Jesus? Today the Lord is the Spirit, We can enjoy Him, touch Him and be in His loving presence in the divine mystical realm! Praise be to Him! He is so available! Amen.

Wow, what a beautiful intimate song. We all need to be like Mary, deeply in love with Him and seeking only Him! OH LORD JESUS I LOVE YOU!!! I HAVE FOUND YOU MY BELOVED! I WANT TO FOREVER BE WITH YOU ALL THE DAYS OF MY LIFE!
Don't ask me, angels, why I'm weeping. Nothing but Jesus fills my inner being. I could not hold my tears anymore. O! Lord! I can not live without You~!!
Then I heard a voice said Jssica. That's what I need to belong just to Jesus every day of my life!!! Praise my Lord!!!
It's so refreshing. Amen. Praise the Lord.
This song is so meaningful and very intimate.... May all the sisters have such a kind of love for the Lord...always seeking the Lord and following Him wherever He goes.... O, Lord Jesus, I love You!

I love this song!! Mary was seeking the Lord. The Lord could have gone straight from Hell to sit at the right hand of God, but He stopped because Mary was seeking Him. If we seek the Lord Jesus we will always find Him. Pursue Him!!

i like this song very much, for it reminds me of MARY-how she loved the Lord that much! it turns me from "every" vain thing i want and trying to find to the worthy ONE...causing me to seek only HIM,to hear only HIM.
We have found Jesus! He is making His home in our heart as long as we open up to Him! The very God is in us! What else could we desire? O Lord Jesus!
This is one of the richest hymns I've ever seen. I find it hard to sing without shedding my tears.
Very touching. Feel like crying after hearing/singing it for several times... Amen.
